Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Sir, the Gray Raven Commandant has arrived.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Inside the large laboratory, only Asimov is there debugging various machines.'}
{2: 'Are you alone again?', 3: '7'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "The others have gone to bed since they've been working all night.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'What about you?', 3: '11'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "...I'm not tired.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Asimov! I told you and your team not to overwork yourselves, remember?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Sure... Anyway, remember that I entrusted you with testing the CUBs?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Regarding the project, there has been some... how to say...', 4: '2'}
{2: "Sorry, I need to go. I just remembered that I've got a meeting...", 3: '19'}
{3: 'The smiling Celica swiftly closes the door to the lab unexpectedly, blocking your way out.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "You must've misremembered. I've checked, and you don't have any meetings today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course you have.', 3: '24'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I guess I'll carry on then... We've received two pieces feedback, one of which is not good and the other is bad. Which one do you want to hear first?", 4: '2'}
{2: "Isn't that the same thing…?", 3: '27'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Well, not exactly. You know, the tests and preliminary data collection for the CUB are done...', 4: '2'}
{2: "That's good news!", 3: '29'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Sure, but we've noticed that its AI is lacking without the support of a database, so it can't adapt to complex situations on the battlefields.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Though it doesn't require a perfect AI performance, some combat patterns are needed as a data reference.", 4: '2'}
{2: "That's tricky... but I don't think I can help.", 3: '32'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Just wait and let Asimov finish what he has to say.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'But we can solve this by simulating encounters with different enemies in different environments—although we have already run out of time on that.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'That\'s the "not good news"? What about the bad news?', 3: '35'}
{3: 'Asimov taps the holographic projection display and refreshes the screen, and the word "Chestlefield" pops up.'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'To speed up the process, we\'ve developed "Chestlefield", a program simulating some popular tabletop games from the Golden Age. Given your experience with a CUB, we need you to carry out the test.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Technically, you could say so.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Asimov points to the coffee in his hand.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Safe…? It's at least safer than this cold cup of coffee.", 4: '2'}
{2: "That's not bad news.", 3: '43'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "It's not. I haven't mentioned the bad news.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'The real bad news is that the main rule designer of the simulation program is the one standing beside you. Celica.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Wait! Take a look at my design! You'll be fascinated, I promise!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Just so you know, I'm only responsible for the data collection. I haven't tampered with the content of this program yet...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Mr. Asimov, enough talking... Sit down here, Commandant. I'll teach you how to do it!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Celica pins you down with a surprisingly strong forearm and activates the test program.'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "I'm sure you'll enjoy it!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fingers crossed...'}
